item.title: Comment on Hello world! by A WordPress Commenter
item.dc:creator: A WordPress Commenter
item.description: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from <a href="https://gravatar.com">Gravatar</a>.
item.content:encoded:
Hi, this is a comment.
To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard.
Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Comment on Fashions fade, style is eternal by John Ive
item.dc:creator: John Ive
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://dathasan.github.io/fashions-fade-style-is-eternal/#comment-15">Ylli</a>.
It’s been a decade since Yorke and his team had a song that hit the American charts with the impact of “Breezeblocks” and “Tessellate”.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Ylli.

It’s been a decade since Yorke and his team had a song that hit the American charts with the impact of “Breezeblocks” and “Tessellate”.

item.title: Comment on Vimeo Post by Arlind
item.dc:creator: Arlind
item.description: Everyone is your best friend when you are successful. Make sure that the people that you surround yourself with are also the people that you are not afraid of failing with.
item.content:encoded: Everyone is your best friend when you are successful. Make sure that the people that you surround yourself with are also the people that you are not afraid of failing with.

item.title: Comment on Best Tips for a Successful Magazine by John Ive
item.dc:creator: John Ive
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://dathasan.github.io/best-tips-for-a-successful-magazine/#comment-11">Art</a>.
Hey Art, thank you for your kind words - I will keep the blog updated every week.
- Johny
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Art.

Hey Art,
thank you for your kind words – I will keep the blog updated every week.

– Johny

item.title: Comment on Fashions fade, style is eternal by John
item.dc:creator: John
item.description: Love the new jeans. Could have fun choosing which ones i cant live without.
item.content:encoded: Love the new jeans. Could have fun choosing which ones i cant live without.
